creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: Sleeveless robe of deep blue satin ambroidered with floral medallions and butterflies in shades of blue, pale green, pink, lavender and mustard yellow. Border of same embroidered with floral sprays and medallions in blue and set off from body by a band of brocade braid, chiefly in satin stitch. Worn along bottom. Lining of thin pink satin.
dimension: L.55-1/2 in.; L.51-3/4 in. to collar
title: Sleeveless Robe
